Posts.EditableText: There have been a few library contributions on here recently, so before they get forgotten about, I have added them to this page: http://www.textadventures.co.uk/quest/resources/ If you'd like to contribute a library, or update an existing one, please email me and I'll add/update it on the site. This is just a simple page for the moment - eventually we'll have a "library archive" which will look a lot like the main site, allowing you to review libraries, add comments etc., and you'll be able to upload directly. But this will do in the meantime!
Posts.HTML:
There have been a few library contributions on here recently, so before they get forgotten about, I have added them to this page:

http://www.textadventures.co.uk/quest/resources/

If you'd like to contribute a library, or update an existing one, please email me and I'll add/update it on the site.

This is just a simple page for the moment - eventually we'll have a "library archive" which will look a lot like the main site, allowing you to review libraries, add comments etc., and you'll be able to upload directly. But this will do in the meantime!

Posts.EditableText: We could do with a standard format for documenting functions, commands, etc. and this would be better done soner than later. I would be the first to admit that the simple text I have written so far is not that good.
Posts.HTML: We could do with a standard format for documenting functions, commands, etc. and this would be better done soner than later. I would be the first to admit that the simple text I have written so far is not that good.
